qas.question: How much had FDI increased to in 2006?
Since 2011 direction has Forign direct investment gone?
What has been the change in foreign exhange reserves since 2011?
What has been the overall growth of economy since 2011?

context: Foreign direct investment (FDI) in Egypt increased considerably before the removal of Hosni Mubarak, exceeding <a0_0>$6 billion<a0_0/> in 2006, due to economic liberalisation and privatisation measures taken by minister of investment Mahmoud Mohieddin.[citation needed] Since the fall of Hosni Mubarak in 2011, Egypt has experienced a <a1_0>drastic fall<a1_0/> in both foreign investment and tourism revenues, followed by a <a2_0>60% drop<a2_0/> in foreign exchange reserves, a <a3_0>3% drop<a3_0/> in growth, and a rapid devaluation of the Egyptian pound.
